Name: Nemesis Island
About the game: Tired of Zombie survival games, this game is different. No zombies, but you will have to try and SURVIVE THIS! About After a horrific tragedy while on holiday, Detective Robert Moore got stranded on an island. But this is no ordinary island, you can feel something is not right. Something is watching you...stalking you...maybe even hunting you! Explore the 64kmÂ² Island, the abandoned military installations, seek the secrets. Survive the island and its unique inhabitants, try to figure out the mysteries of the island, it's otherworldly species and abandoned facilities. Explore, equip yourself and get to safety, but beware, this is not a normal tropical paradise, this island really wants you dead. Explore rivers, volcanos, mountains and forests. Learn to survive, try to stay alive. Early Access Early access, so the game will have missing features and content, but we aim to grow with our community, the game will evolve with you and your input. Please be patient with the development, we will bring out an update almost every week, to improve gameplay and your gaming experience.
